#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	int n;
	scanf("%d",&n);
    while(n-->0){
        int t;
        scanf("%d",&t);
        int sum=0,last,diff;
        while(t-->0){
            scanf("%d %d",&diff,&last);
            int first=last%diff;
            sum+=((first+last)*((last-first)/diff+1))/2;
            sum=sum%2;
        }
        if(sum%2==1)printf("YES\n");
        else printf("NO\n");
    }
}
